title: fat_proc_connec_vis
description: This program is for visualizing the volumetric output of tracking, mainly for the '-dump_rois ...' from 3dTrackID. It creates surface-ized views of the separate white matter connection maps (WMCs) which can be viewed simultaneously in 3D with SUMA.

tcat_file.title: Output Tcat File
tcat_file.description: Concatenated ROI masks multibrick file from the -output_tcat flag

tstat_file.title: Output Tstat File
tstat_file.description: Single brick file from 3dTstat operation on the tcat dataset, produced by the -output_tstat flag
